text: Ani nuha(alaihis'salama) pachi hamile aru paigambaraharula'i tiniharuko kaumatarpha pathayaum, ta uniharule tiniharuche'u spasta nisaniharu li'era a'e tara tiniharule aghi asvikara garisakeko kurama visvasa garne thi'enan. Yasai prakara hamile ullanghanakariharuko hrdayako dvara banda garidinchaum
